title: Minutes of Tainan City Government’s 428th Municipal Administrative Meeting Mayor’s remarks 3/3/2020
content: Mayor’s Remarks:1. In light of the continuous development of the COVID-19 outbreak and its impact on local businesses, the government decides to cut down the rent for shop owners and venders for city markets and venues managed by outsourced partners.2. The Economic Development Bureau should work with the vendors to upgrade anti-virus equipment and improve relevant procedures in traditional markets as soon as possible.
